caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee, v. ALVIN J. K.

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 08-1-0366)
opinion.attorneys: Taryn R. Tomasa, Deputy Public Defender, for petitioner/defendant-appellant.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: MOON, C.J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, Duffy, and Recktenwald, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner/defendant-appellant Alvin J. K. Kapahua, Jr.'s application for writ of certiorari, filed may 6, 2010, is hereby rejected.
